testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "test2@example.com" field..............................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "test2@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".....................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: User could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".....................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.name: User could change the currency
testcase.system-out: Given user go to home page..................................................passed When select Euro currency from the dropdown.................................passed Then Euro Symbol is shown on the 4 products displayed in Home page..........passed

testcase.name: Logged user could search using product name
testcase.system-out: Given user has logged in....................................................passed And user is at home page....................................................passed When user enter product name as "book"......................................passed And user press enter........................................................passed Then search results should appear and contain "book"........................passed

testcase.name: Logged user could search using product name 2
testcase.system-out: Given user has logged in....................................................passed And user is at home page....................................................passed When user enter product name as "laptop"....................................passed And user press enter........................................................passed Then search results should appear and contain "laptop"......................passed

testcase.name: Logged user could search using product name 3
testcase.system-out: Given user has logged in....................................................passed And user is at home page....................................................passed When user enter product name as "nike"......................................passed And user press enter........................................................passed Then search results should appear and contain "nike"........................passed

testcase.name: Logged user could search for product using sku
testcase.system-out: Given user has logged in....................................................passed And user is at home page....................................................passed When user enter product sku as "SCI_FAITH"..................................passed And user press enter........................................................passed Then search result should contain "SCI_FAITH"...............................passed

testcase.name: Logged user could search for product using sku 2
testcase.system-out: Given user has logged in....................................................passed And user is at home page....................................................passed When user enter product sku as "APPLE_CAM"..................................passed And user press enter........................................................passed Then search result should contain "APPLE_CAM"...............................passed

testcase.name: Logged user could search for product using sku 3

testcase.system-out: Given user has logged in....................................................passed And user is at home page....................................................passed When user hovers over any random category...................................passed And user clicks sub-category if found.......................................passed Then page title should contain category or sub-category name................passed
